title: Green beans with capers & crispy parsley

ingredients.item: 3 cloves garlic, peeled and finely sliced

instructions.step: Bring a large pan of salted water to a rolling boil. Trim the stalk end of the beans but leave the tails, then add to the pan of boiling water and cook for 8 minutes or until tender, drain.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a small frying pan and fry the capers, parsley and garlic until crisp.Â Drain on kitchen paper and scatter
over the beans with a generous seasoning of black pepper. Serve with the lamb stifado.
